name: SmartAlbert
0:
”Alexa, tell smart albert to send message”
”Alexa, tell smart albert to set home mode”
”Alexa, ask smart albert to set D N D on”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart albert
des:
First, you need an Akuvox IT82 device.Otherwise, this skill will be of little use to you.
This Skill can help users set up basic configurations through Alexa.
More information about IT82 you can visit http://www.akuvox.com/prob/ 
 
For example, you can use it like this:
User: Alexa, tell smart albert to set DND on.
Skill: OK, DND is on. Feel your inner peace.
Then your IT82 will open the DND function.

User: Alexa, tell smart albert to send message.
Skill: Here you go.
Then your IT82 will jump to the Message page.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
